summary: Comprehensive frontend testing of 10 pan/zoom/UI features for 'thought stick' app (iteration 3). All 10 tests PASSED: pan state injection via wheel event, pan-hint UI, zoom+pan reset, throw instructions pill, cancel button pill shape, composer color preview, voice error CSS, expanded color row, full end-to-end flow, and localStorage persistence.

issues: Design looks correct: warm/creamy colors, no gradients, no purple. Voice error message renders with reddish background as expected. 4 color dots visible and functional.

critical_code_review_comments: All 10 features implemented and working correctly.
Pan state (panX/panY) correctly wired to board-canvas transform: translate(panX, panY) scale(zoom).
Pan hint correctly shows/hides based on Math.abs(panX) > 20 || Math.abs(panY) > 20 condition.
Zoom-reset button (zoom-reset-btn) correctly resets both zoom AND pan to defaults (setZoom(1); setPanX(0); setPanY(0)).
ThrowableNote cancel button (.throw-cancel-btn) is pill-shaped: width=90px, height=36px (border-radius:24px, padding:0 14px).
Voice error: SpeechRecognition IS available in Playwright's Chromium as 'function'. Override approach worked — DOM element rendered with correct red styling (rgba(192, 57, 43, 0.08) background).
Full flow drag-to-land works correctly with framer-motion; expanded card color update (bg changes to rgb(135,206,235) for sky) persists after close.
seed_data_creation: Test notes injected via localStorage in test script; board cleared before each test requiring a fresh state.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 10 pan+zoom+UI features pass: (1) Board pan via wheel event (no-ctrl deltaX/deltaY pans the canvas, transform=translate(200px,150px) scale(1) confirmed), (2) Pan hint [data-testid=pan-hint] appears when abs(panX)>20 or abs(panY)>20, (3) zoom-reset-btn resets both zoom and pan (pan-hint disappears), (4) throw-instructions pill visible in throw mode, (5) cancel-throw-btn is pill: 90px wide x 36px tall, (6) Composer color preview: SVG fills change from #F9E07B->7BC47F->87CEEB matching selected dot, (7) voice-error CSS: rgba(192,57,43,0.08) background + rendered correctly when mic fires 'not-allowed' error, (8) expanded-color-picker has 4 dots, (9) full flow works (throw+land+expand+color+close all working), (10) localStorage persistence confirmed. Previous iteration 2 features also still working (regression clean).
